name: Super Bombeirinho
description:
Super Bombeirinho is a 2D platform game where you take on the role of a young firefighter on a mission to save lives and extinguish fires. The main character is a boy who dreams of becoming a firefighter, but due to his small stature, nobody believes in his real ability. He does everything in his power to become a real firefighter using the items in his backpack. So get ready to face the challenges that come your way and show your true worth!

The game is focused on saving lives, collecting items, extinguishing fires, completing NPC quests, and helping people in need with Super Bombeirinho. The game has 2D platform-style levels filled with obstacles and challenges. The map is in a top-view style, where you explore and help people throughout the map.

Inspired by 90s generation games, with most pixel art in 16x16.
The game has a vibrant and colorful look.
Remembering the old classic games of Super Nintendo and Mega Drive.

I am open to discussing partnership possibilities, such as revenue sharing or co-marketing efforts. 

E-mail: b1gjefgamesdev@gmail.com
GDD: https://conhecimentocursos.my.canva.site/superbombeirinho
